channel.title: How to start a music when my client has finished to load?
channel.description: How to start a music when my client has finished to load ? I want to start the music of RuneScape. I have it but I don't know how to play it when I loaded my client. It's "jingle 1". So, how can I make this ?

item.title: How to start a music when my client has finished to load?

item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

How to start a music when my client has finished to load ? I want to start the music of RuneScape. I have it but I don’t know how to play it when I loaded my client. It’s “jingle 1”. So, how can I make this ?
